name: laststaticsitegenerator
description: The LastStaticSiteGenerator combines the best tools for the job to simplify your frontend-developer-live. Zero configuration! Hot-reloading everything!

scripts.dev: npm run clean && npm run production:eleventy && run-p --race dev:eleventy dev:parcel
scripts.dev:https: npm run clean && npm run production:eleventy && run-p --race dev:eleventy dev:parcel:https
scripts.production: npm run clean && npm run production:eleventy && npm run production:parcel

author: Kolja Kutschera
